trans-unit.source: Gets role information for Windows-based applications from an [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] roles service.
trans-unit.target: 获取从基于 Windows 的应用程序的角色信息[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)]角色服务。

trans-unit.source: You can use client application services to retrieve role information from an existing roles service by configuring your application to use the ClientRoleProvider class.
trans-unit.target: 客户端应用程序服务可用于通过配置应用程序使用 ClientRoleProvider 类从现有的角色服务中检索角色信息。

trans-unit.source: After configuration, you can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 完成配置后，你可以确定已经过身份验证的用户是否对特定角色中通过调用<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>返回`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>.
trans-unit.target: 对于配置为使用客户端应用程序服务的应用程序，此属性返回一种<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Because this class implements the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 因为此类实现<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>接口，则你不需要显式引用它。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method internally calls the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

The ClientRoleProvider class is a read-only role membership provider that retrieves role information for authenticated users from the roles service indicated by the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ClientRoleProvider 类是只读的角色的成员资格提供程序，从通过指示的角色服务检索经过身份验证的用户角色信息<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A> property is typically retrieved from the application configuration file along with other configuration values.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A>从应用程序配置文件以及其他配置值通常检索属性。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 配置客户端应用程序服务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the current ClientRoleProvider instance through the `static` <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索通过当前 ClientRoleProvider 实例`static`<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ClientRoleProvider class supports only the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: ClientRoleProvider 类仅支持的<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>和<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>方法的<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>抽象类。</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call one of these methods for a particular user, the service provider first checks the local data cache for role information.
trans-unit.target: 当你针对特定用户调用这些方法之一时，服务提供程序将首先检查角色信息的本地数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: If the cache does not contain any role information or the cache has expired, the service provider retrieves the role information from the roles service and adds it to the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存不包含任何角色信息或缓存已过期，服务提供程序将从角色服务中检索角色信息，并将其添加到缓存。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the time-out period for the roles cache when you configure client application services.
trans-unit.target: 在配置客户端应用程序服务时，可以指定角色缓存的超时期限。

trans-unit.source: To force the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method to retrieve role data from the service instead of the local cache, call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ResetCache%2A> method first.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法来检索角色的数据，而不是本地缓存，调用该服务从<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ResetCache%2A>方法第一个。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ResetCache%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the ClientRoleProvider class to create or delete roles, or to modify the role membership of users.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建或删除角色，或修改用户的角色成员资格，不能将 ClientRoleProvider 类。

trans-unit.source: To create or modify role information, you must change the configuration of the role service on the server.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建或修改角色信息，必须更改服务器上的角色服务的配置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider"></xref> class.
This method is not used by this class.
Not used.
Not used.
Always thrown.

Setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application for the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method is not used by this class.
Not used.

This method is not used by this class.
Not used.

Not applicable.
This method always throws an exception.
Always thrown.
This method is not used by this class.

Not used.
Not applicable.
This method always throws an exception.
Always thrown.
This method is not used by this class.
Not applicable.
This method always throws an exception.
Always thrown.
Gets the names of the roles that the specified user belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的用户所属的角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: The GetRolesForUser method retrieves role information for the current, authenticated user, which you must specify in the `username` parameter.
trans-unit.target: GetRolesForUser 方法检索当前的经过身份验证用户，你必须在指定的角色信息`username`参数。

trans-unit.source: You can get the user name through the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as follows: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取用户名称`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，如下所示︰ `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供程序缓存角色有关的信息本地文件系统，从而避免不必要的服务调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>类概述。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the user to retrieve roles for.
trans-unit.target: 要检索有关角色的用户的名称。

trans-unit.source: The role names that username belongs to or an empty array if the user is not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 角色名称 username 属于或如果用户未经过身份验证的空数组。

trans-unit.source: username is or .
-or- username is not the user name of the current, authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: -或-username不是当前经过身份验证的用户的用户名。

trans-unit.source: This method is not used by this class.
Not used.
Not applicable.
This method always throws an exception.
Always thrown.
Initializes the provider.

The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the Initialize method to initialize the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider> using information in your application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]扩展性模型调用初始化方法以初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>使用应用程序配置文件中的信息。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: This method recognizes the following role service configuration attributes: - `name` - `description` - `cacheTimeout` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` - `honorCookieExpiry` For more information about these attributes, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 此方法识别的以下角色服务配置属性:- `name` - `description` - `cacheTimeout` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` - `honorCookieExpiry`有关这些属性的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 配置客户端应用程序服务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the provider.
A collection of name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.
trans-unit.target: 表示此提供程序的配置中指定的提供程序特定属性的名称/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: name is .
-or- config is .
name is empty.
-or- config contains an unrecognized value.
For more information, see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分。

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider"></xref> has already been initialized.
config contains a `cacheTimeout` value that is not in the correct format for conversion to an value.
trans-unit.target: config包含`cacheTimeout`值转换为正确的格式不是值。

trans-unit.source: config contains a `cacheTimeout` value that represents a number less than or greater than .
trans-unit.target: config包含`cacheTimeout`表示的数字的值小于或大于。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified user is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定的用户是否属于指定角色。

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定已经过身份验证的用户是否对特定角色中通过调用<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>返回`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>.
trans-unit.target: 对于配置为使用客户端应用程序服务的应用程序，此属性返回一种<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Because this class implements the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 因为此类实现<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>接口，则你不需要显式引用它。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method internally calls the IsUserInRole method.

The IsUserInRole method uses the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method to determine whether the user indicated by `username` is in the role indicated by `roleName`.
trans-unit.target: IsUserInRole 方法使用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法来确定用户是否由`username`中指示的角色`roleName`。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供程序缓存角色有关的信息本地文件系统，从而避免不必要的服务调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>类概述。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the user.
The name of the role.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified user is in the specified role; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the specified user is not authenticated or is not in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的用户是否属于指定角色;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果指定的用户进行身份验证或不在指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: username is or .
-or- username is not the user name of the current, authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: -或-username不是当前经过身份验证的用户的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The user is no longer authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 用户无法再进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: -or- The roles service is not available.
This method is not used by this class.
Not used.
Not used.
Always thrown.
Clears the cached role information and resets the cache time-out period.
trans-unit.target: 清除缓存的角色信息并将重置缓存超时期限。

trans-unit.source: The ResetCache method removes all role information from the local cache and causes the cache to expire.
trans-unit.target: ResetCache 方法从本地缓存中删除所有角色信息，并导致缓存过期。

trans-unit.source: After you call this method, your next call to the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> or <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> method will retrieve role information from the configured role service instead of the local cache.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后，你下一次调用到<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>或<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>方法将从配置的角色服务而不是本地缓存中检索角色信息。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to enable users to refresh the roles cache when their role has changed but the cache has not yet expired.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于使用户能够在其角色已更改，但缓存尚未过期时进行刷新角色缓存。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to set the roles cache time-out interval, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何设置角色缓存超时间隔的信息，请参阅[如何︰ 配置客户端应用程序服务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method is not used by this class.
Not used.
Not applicable.
This method always throws an exception.
Always thrown.
Gets or sets the URI of the role service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置角色服务的 URI。

trans-unit.source: You can set the ServiceUri property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在应用程序代码中，设置 ServiceUri 属性，但你通常将设置应用程序配置文件中的值。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code.
trans-unit.target: 这使您无需重新编译你的代码更改的服务位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 配置客户端应用程序服务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Role_JSON_AppService.axd".
trans-unit.target: 当以编程方式设置服务位置时，你必须指定完整的服务 URI，它将始终以"Role_JSON_AppService.axd"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The role service URI.
When getting this property, no service URI was found in the application configuration file, and this property has not been previously set.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性时，没有服务 URI 找到在应用程序配置文件中，并且以前尚未设置此属性。
